mainfeatures: Digital Video resolutions -1280 x 720 (HD), 640 x 480 (VGA) and 320 x 240(QVGA) 12 mega-pixels camera with choice of 8 digital camera resolutions – 4032 x 3024 (12M), 3648 x 2736 (10M), 3264 x 2448 (8M), 3648 x 2048 (7M HD), 2592 x 1944 (5M), 2048 x 1536 (3M), 1920 x 1080 (2M HD) and 640 x 480 (VGA) 2.7" TFT LCD 8x Digital Zoom TV out Supports external SD memory card up to 32GB(Class 4 or above is strongly recommended) Built-in Microphone, Speaker Takes digital photos, videos Delete, rotate, protect and print photos directly on and from your camera Video impression software is a tool for producing custom movies and slide show using your own video clips, and sound tracks
specifications: Model: HD-C4 Image Sensor: 5 Mega Pixels CMOS Sensor Image Resolution: 4032 x 3024 (12M); 3648 x 2736 (10M); 3264 x 2448 (8M); 3648 x 2048 (7MHD); 2592 x 1944 (5M); 2048 x 1536 (3M); 1920 x 1080 (2MHD); 640 x 480 (VGA) Video Resolution: 1280 x 720 (HD); 640 x 480 (VGA); 320 x 240 (QVGA) LCD Display: 2.7 inches TFT LCD Internal Memory: 16MB SDRAM (Buffer) External Memory: SD Card (Up to 32GB) Digital Zoom: 8x Digital Zoom Exposure: EV-3.0 ~ EV+3.0 White Balance: Auto / Daylight / Cloudy / Tungsten / Fluorescent ISO: Auto / 100 / 200 / 400 Self-timer: 10s / 5s / 2s File Format: JPEG (Still Image) / AVI (Video) Flash: 2 x LED Interface: USB 2.0 System: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / MAC Battery: 4 x AAA (1.5V) Working Temperature: 0~40℃ Additional Function: Anti-shake / TV out / Microphone / Speaker / PictBridge / Recorder Dimension (L x W x H): 125 x 65 x 70 mm
packagecontents: 1 x Digital camcorder 1 x Li-ion Battery 1 x USB Cable 1 x AV Cable 1 x CD-ROM software disc 1 x Camera Pouch 1 x User Manual
